title: Fix ICPInfoPage: heading text and top section readability

requirements.text: On the ICPInfoPage (frontend/src/pages/ICPInfoPage.tsx), change the heading that currently reads 'teknologiinformasjon' to 'Vår teknologi'.

quotes: på siden om Internet Computer så er det en overskrift hvor det står 'teknologiinformasjon'. Dette er ikke korrekt norsk og skal byttes ut med 'Vår teknologi'

acceptanceCriteria: The heading in the top section of ICPInfoPage reads 'Vår teknologi' and not 'teknologiinformasjon'.

requirements.text: On the ICPInfoPage, change all text in the top/hero section to black so it is clearly readable against the background.

quotes: hele dette øverste feltet uleselig, så om du kan forbedre lesbarheten med svart tekst på avsnittet

acceptanceCriteria: All text (headings and body paragraphs) in the top section of ICPInfoPage is rendered in black.
Text is legible against the background.

requirements.text: On the ICPInfoPage, increase the CSS blur amount on the background image in the top/hero section to improve readability.
acceptanceCriteria: The background image in the top section of ICPInfoPage has a noticeably stronger blur effect than before.
The increased blur makes the overlaid text easier to read.

constraints: Only modify ICPInfoPage.tsx; do not change other pages or shared components unless strictly required.
Do not alter immutable frontend paths.
nonGoals: Changes to other pages (LandingPage, ClientPortal, etc.).
